description: Maximal value of p(C(n,k)) over k, where p()=A001222 = number of prime factors counted with multiplicity.
example: n=24: the sums of prime factor exponents when k runs from 0 to 24 are {0,4,4,5,5,7,6,8,6,8,8,9,7,9,8,8,6,8,6,7,5,5,4,4,0}. The maximum is 9, so a(24)=9.
author: _Labos Elemer_
